seed_pair.known: I don't like taking too much time to answer.
seed_pair.target: No me gusta tomar demasiado tiempo para responder.

curation_metadata.curated_by: Claude Code - Phase 5 v3.0 strict GATE compliance
changes_from_previous: Fixed grammatical issues in S0027L04: 'para responder' only used in appropriate contexts

practice_phrases: I don't like to learn Spanish
I don't like to feel ready
I don't like to meet people who speak Spanish
no me gusta encontrar personas que hablan español
I like Spanish but I don't like to speak
me gusta español pero no me gusta hablar
I don't like to start talking more soon
no me gusta comenzar a hablar más pronto
I don't like to feel as if I were nearly ready
no me gusta sentir como si estuviera casi preparado
I don't like to speak with everyone else later on
no me gusta hablar con todos los demás más tarde
